body.name: Chef Knife 8 Inch Damascus Japan VG-10 Super Stainless Steel Professional High Carbon Super Sharp Kitchen Cooking Knife, Ergonomic Color Wooden Handle Luxury Gift Box
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: [Selection of high-end gifts] Our Damascus knife has a unique and very beautiful natural casting texture. The V-shaped sharp edges can sharpen the hands precisely to 10-15 ° on each side and easily cut into thin slices. And comes with a beautiful gift box. The handle is made of stable and high-density colored wood.

[Super sharp cutting core material] This product is made of professional super steel VG10 cutting core (made of 67-layer Damascus high-carbon stainless steel), which is hammered by vacuum heat treatment. During the folding and forging process, Damascus steel will form very dense fine metal grains, which will sharpen the fine sawtooth super sharp edges on the cutting edge.

[Perfectly balanced performance] The 8-inch master knife can be used with both hands. It has a better cutting balance angle without causing physical fatigue, allowing us to cut faster and more efficiently. Features: The blade is slender, lightweight, and the sharp edges are suitable for various foods.

[Focus on technology and design] Aisyoko has For many years of advanced craftsmanship in kitchen knife manufacturing. Compared with other knives, our 8-inch chef's knives are too sharp, can keep sharp for a long time, easy to re-sharpen the knife, labor-saving design, the cutting angle of front, back, up and down is better. A smart choice for home cooks and professional cooks.

[100% customer service + material description] Product warranty: Aisyoko products provide 30 days refund, replacement and lifetime warranty. We are always ready to provide you with the most satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: aisyoko 8-inch chef's knife is made of a professional super steel VG10 cutting core, surrounded by 67 layers of Damascus steel, and hammered by vacuum heat treatment. In the process of folding and forging, very dense fine metal grains are formed and a unique texture is formed, which will make the fine serrations on the cutting edge super sharp.

Frighteningly sharp The highest blade material VG10 Damascus steel uses vacuum heat treatment and nitrogen cooling technology to ensure that the blade hardness reaches 62±2HRC. Vacuum heat treatment prevents the surface embrittlement of the refractory metal of the material, improves the surface quality of the tool material, and increases the plasticity, efficiency and resistance of the tool Corrosion, so that the knife has the best performance and applicability. Super long sharpness and durability Our Damascus steel chef's knife can maintain the sharpness for about 6 months, needs to be sharpened again, and is easy to re-sharpened. Natural Damascus Pattern The process of folding and forging, it was folded 33 times to form a layered water ripple Damascus pattern. Each blade has a unique texture. These beautiful Damascus patterns can resist stains, corrosion and discoloration.

Color solid wood handle Innovatively designed colored solid wood handles, made of stable and high-density colored wood, are more durable and feel better than ordinary wood. Ergonomic design, comfortable, non-slip, easy to clean. V-Shaped Cutting Edge Insist on using the best hand-made "V-shaped" cutting edge, the sharp V-shaped cutting edge can accurately sharpen each side to 10-15°, and it is easy to cut into thin slices. Balance-easy and effortless The design ratio of blade and handle is 1:1 Will not feel tired after long time use. Newbies in the kitchen can easily master it.

Professional kitchen knife brand for 32 years: aisyoko was founded in 1989 and is located in Yangjiang, the capital of knives in China (a city famous for the craftsmanship of knifemakers in 1500). It is an industry and trade company integrating R&D, production and sales. Our factory has the most advanced production equipment and a complete management system. Warm Tips: After using the knife, clean it with water every day, wipe the dirt on the tool, and keep the tool clean and in good condition.Do not use this knife to cut hard food (such as fish bones, animal bones, frozen food, etc.), which will seriously damage the blade.The kitchen knife is sharp and used carefully to avoid cuts. It is not recommended for children under the age of 18 to avoid accidents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great knife for the price! Very pretty and cuts fantastic would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality knife

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a fantastic and sharp knife!!! Absolutely phenomenal and extremely sharp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aisyoko Pairing knife
reviews.reviewText: I already have the Aisyoko chef knife and wanted the pairing knife to go with it. Better than anticipated. Beautiful knife. Razor sharp. Feels wonderful to hold. Cuts like a dream. I love this company and will definitely buy more knives from them!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great knife, very sharp
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using mine for a couple of weeks now and it’s a joy to use. The round handle is very comfortable and it’s very sharp. Makes my prep work easier. Just don’t get your fingers in the way.Update.Downgrade to 4 stars. Yes it’s very sharp but the edge is very weak. I tried to cut a thawed turkey neck in half and the edge rolled badly. Before doing that I noticed a nick in the edge and I hadn’t cut anything hard. Always hand washed it, carefully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The knife is well balanced and sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so awesome!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this as a gift from my son. I'm not a professional chef, but love cooking at home for my family. As such, I've never owned a knife this expensive, so I was super excited. Out of the box, the knife is absolutely beautiful from the Damascus pattern on the blade to the very end of the handle. The first thing I tried the knife on was a potato. Quite frankly, it was like sliding a hot knife through butter. The knife handle fits very comfortably in my hand unlike most of my other kitchen knives. The handle's shape and location on the knife are such that my knuckles don't hit the cutting board while using the knife. As of right now I am excitedly giving this knife 5 stars - would purchase again. Will definitely update down the road if needed, but so far, this is a must-buy for me.UPDATEJust a quick update. The knife is still awesome! I did have to hone it a bit, as it's my go-to when I'm in the kitchen and even the best blade will start to dull with use. It takes very little effort to put that edge back on and lasts for quite a while. I am STILL in love with this knife and would give an extra star if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received an Aisyoko Santoku as a Christmas gift, I liked it so much I ordered their 8" Chefs knife.The only problem is the scabbard is missing, this knife definitely needs one.
